entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
